Text:
Dumb Question:

What does "Countdown" mean? I see it in a lot of the descriptions but no one explains what it means.

Does it mean the main fight is in it PLUS all the undercard fights? or does it mean only the countdown fights and not the main bout?
The countdown shows are made to hype the event, gives a brief history of the fighters, possible rivalry and does some interviews. Keeps you going while waiting for the main event to download.
